column1: # Readings for January-May 1875 and September-November 1877 are duplicated with Partney readings, and have been retained.
# The 1878-1879 readings were from a gauge which was temporarily relocated from Partney.
# The 1875-1877 observer, Robert Mackinder, lived at Langton Cottage.
# The 1878-1879 observer was Rev J Owston, presumably located at neighbouring Langton Rectory.
